name: Teleport Man
description:
Controls:

Use WASD to control the character

Use the arrow keys to shoot a bullet

Use a space bar to teleport to the bullet

Use F to start or pause the game

Zombies chase the player and come in waves.

If the player is caught, their progress is reset.

Attempt to maximize your score as you teleport to your bullets to avoid zombies.

If the character isn't red, they can shoot another bullet, but only one bullet exists at a time
